subject: Communication
title: Crucial Conversations: When Stakes Are High
description: A quick win: understand Crucial Conversations: When Stakes Are High.

hook.text: Three conditions define a crucial conversation: high stakes, opposing opinions, and strong emotions.

buildup.text: Patterson et al. found that the ability to handle crucial conversations predicts career success, relationships, and.

discovery.text: The key skill: 'Make it safe.' When people feel unsafe, they either go silent (withdraw) or go violent (attack).

twist.text: Creating safety doesn't mean avoiding hard truths. It means delivering them in a way that preserves mutual respect.

climax.text: The formula: share facts first, then your story, then ask for theirs. Facts are least controversial; stories are most.

punchline.text: Hard conversations aren't hard because of the topic.

quiz.question: What are the three conditions that define a crucial conversation?
options: High stakes, opposing opinions, strong emotions
Multiple parties, legal issues, public scrutiny
